pageProps.content: Poster images from the “show and tell” session, and slide packs from many presentations given at Hydra Connect #2 last week can be found [linked from the Hydra wiki](https://wiki.duraspace.org/display/hydra/The+Hydra+Project).  The wiki front page also has a nice group photo – the full size version, should you want it, is linked from the conference program at the time it was taken – 12:30 on Wednesday.
